name: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd.
description: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd. is a global cruise company that operates a diverse portfolio of cruise brands, which includes Norwegian Cruise Line, Oceania Cruises, and Regent Seven Seas Cruises. Founded in 1966 and headquartered in Miami, Florida, NCLH has established itself as a leader in the cruise industry, offering unique itineraries and exceptional experiences at sea. The company is known for its innovative freestyle cruising concept, which allows guests the flexibility to choose their dining, entertainment, and activity options without rigid schedules. NCLH operates a modern fleet of ships, each designed to provide luxurious accommodations and amenities. The company is committed to enhancing guest experiences while maintaining a strong focus on sustainability and environmental responsibility. In recent years, NCLH has invested in new ship designs and technology, including energy-efficient systems and waste management solutions. As it continues to recover from the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings is poised to capitalize on the growing demand for cruise vacations, with an emphasis on health and safety protocols to ensure passenger well-being.

key_executives.name: Mark Kempa
key_executives.position: Executive Vice President & Chief Financial Officer

faq.answer: Norwegian Cruise Line is known for its freestyle cruising concept, offering guests flexibility in dining and activities.

faq.answer: Frank Del Rio is the President and CEO of Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd.

faq.answer: Norwegian Cruise Line is headquartered in Miami, Florida, USA.

faq.answer: NCLH operates Norwegian Cruise Line, Oceania Cruises, and Regent Seven Seas Cruises.

faq.answer: Norwegian Cruise Line was founded in 1966.
